# PaymentCardTransactionRequest.TransactionAmountDescription.surchargeAmount(_:)

**Case**

The transaction’s surcharge amount. Only allowed for [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardTransactionRequest/TransactionType/purchase]

## Declaration

```swift
case surchargeAmount(Decimal)
```
